question.body: Which of the following is the correct order of events in a muscle twitch as illustrated by a myogram?

multiple_choice.choice: Contraction phase, latent period, relaxation phase
Latent period, relaxation phase , contraction phase
Latent period, contraction phase, relaxation phase

response.feedback: Incorrect. Contraction phase is the middle phase on a myogram.
Incorrect. Relaxation phase is the last phase on the myogram.
Correct. The latent periods is the first then contraction and finally relaxation.
Incorrect. One of the above answers is correct.
